trans-unit.source: Added ‘s support for statusmessages without a redirect. This uses annotations on the request instead of direct values, so we avoid the possibility of sneaking those in via query strings. [tomster, hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Added ‘s support for statusmessages without a redirect. This uses annotations on the request instead of direct values, so we avoid the possibility of sneaking those in via query strings. [tomster, hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Added explicit translation of statusmessages before storing them in the cookie. This makes sure we have a reasonable context to base the translation on. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Добавлен явный перевод статусных сообщений перед их сохранением в куки-файле.Это гарантирует,что у нас есть разумный контекст,на котором основан перевод.[ханнош]

trans-unit.source: Added the IAttributeAnnotatable interface assignment for the request to this package as well as the inclusion of the zope.annotation, as we rely on it. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Добавлено назначение интерфейса IAttributeAnnotatable для запроса к данному пакету,а также включение аннотации zope.annotation,на которую мы полагаемся.[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Changed license to BSD, to make it possible to include it as a dependency in Archetypes. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Изменена лицензия на BSD,что позволило включить её в качестве зависимости в Archetypes.[ханнош]

trans-unit.source: Changed the default type of a new message from the empty string to info. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Изменен тип нового сообщения по умолчанию с пустой строки на информацию.[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Converted to a package in the Products namespace. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Преобразовано в пакет в именном пространстве "Продукты".[hannosch]
Объявите о пакетных и тестовых зависимостях.[Ханнош]

trans-unit.source: Fix issue where encoding and decoding of statusmessages into cookie raised exception, because of
trans-unit.target: Устранение проблемы,при которой кодирование и декодирование сообщений о статусе в куки приводило к возникновению исключений из-за

trans-unit.source: Fixed deprecation warning for the zcml content directive. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Исправлено предупреждение об удалении для директивы содержимого zcml.[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Fixed duplicate message bug. Showing identical messages to the end user more than once, doesn’t make any sense. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/6109. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Fixed duplicate message bug. Showing identical messages to the end user more than once, doesn’t make any sense. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/6109. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Fixed encoding format for the cookie value. The former format imposed a serious security risk. The full security issue is tracked at: http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvename.cgi?name=CVE-2007-5741. This also fixes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/6943. [hannosch, witsch, mj]
trans-unit.target: Fixed encoding format for the cookie value. The former format imposed a serious security risk. The full security issue is tracked at: http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvename.cgi?name=CVE-2007-5741. This also fixes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/6943. [hannosch, witsch, mj]

trans-unit.source: Fixed serious memory leak and did some code improvements. [hannosch, alecm]
trans-unit.target: Исправлена серьезная утечка памяти и сделаны некоторые улучшения кода.[hannosch,alecm]

trans-unit.source: It is quite common to write status messages which should be shown to the user after some action. These messages of course should be internationalized. As these messages normally are defined in Python code, the common way to i18n-ize these in Zope is to use zope.i18n Messages. Messages are complex objects consisting of a translation domain and a default unicode text and might have an additional mapping dict and a distinct id.
trans-unit.target: Весьма распространено написание статусных сообщений,которые должны быть показаны пользователю после какого-то действия.Эти сообщения,конечно же,должны быть интернационализированы.Так как эти сообщения обычно определяются в коде Python,то обычным способом i18n-изменить их в Zope является использование сообщений zope.i18n.Сообщения представляют собой сложные объекты,состоящие из области трансляции и текста в юникоде по умолчанию,и могут иметь дополнительный диктат отображения и четкий идентификатор.

trans-unit.source: More code simplification. Make the code itself independent of Zope2. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Больше упрощения кода.Сделать сам код независимым от Zope2.[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Removed a five:implements statement, as the ZPublisher.HTTPRequest is always an IBrowserRequest in Zope 2.12. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Удалено утверждение 5:имплементации,так как ZPublisher.HTTPRequest всегда IBrowserRequest в Зоне 2.12.[Ханнош]

trans-unit.source: Simplified the interface to use simpler add/show method names while keeping backwards compatibility. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Упрощенный интерфейс,позволяющий использовать более простые имена методов добавления/показания,сохраняя при этом обратную совместимость.[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Stopped the cookie from being expired if a redirect (301, 302) or not-modified (304) response is sent. This means that if you set a redirect and then (superfluously) render a template that would show the status message, you won’t lose the message. [optilude]
trans-unit.target: Stopped the cookie from being expired if a redirect (301, 302) or not-modified (304) response is sent. This means that if you set a redirect and then (superfluously) render a template that would show the status message, you won’t lose the message. [optilude]

trans-unit.source: The solution provided by this module is to store the status messages inside a cookie. In version 1.x a server side session like storage has been used, but this turned out not to be caching friendly for the usual web caching strategies.
trans-unit.target: Решение,предоставляемое этим модулем,заключается в сохранении сообщений о состоянии внутри куки-файла.В версии 1.x использовался сеанс серверной стороны как хранилище,но это оказалось не очень удобным для кэширования обычных стратегий веб-кэширования.

trans-unit.source: The usual way to provide status messages in CMF/Plone has been to add a “?portal_status_messages=some%20text” to the URL. While this has some usability problems it also isn’t possible to i18n-ize these in the common way, as the URL is currently limited to the ASCII charset, but an encoding providing support for the full unicode range is required.
trans-unit.target: The usual way to provide status messages in CMF/Plone has been to add a “?portal_status_messages=some%20text” to the URL. While this has some usability problems it also isn’t possible to i18n-ize these in the common way, as the URL is currently limited to the ASCII charset, but an encoding providing support for the full unicode range is required.

trans-unit.source: Total reimplementation using cookies instead of a server-side in-memory storage to store status messages. The reasoning behind this change is that the former approach didn’t play well with web caching strategies and added an additional burden in ZEO environments (having to use load-balancers, which are able to identify users and keep them connected to the same ZEO server). [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Total reimplementation using cookies instead of a server-side in-memory storage to store status messages. The reasoning behind this change is that the former approach didn’t play well with web caching strategies and added an additional burden in ZEO environments (having to use load-balancers, which are able to identify users and keep them connected to the same ZEO server). [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: TypeError: Struct() argument 1 must be string, not unicode
trans-unit.target: TypeError:Аргумент Struct()1 должен быть строковым,а не юникодовым.

trans-unit.source: Update code to follow Plone styleguide. [gforcada]
trans-unit.target: Обновите код,чтобы следовать стилистическому руководству Plone.[gforcada]

trans-unit.source: Updated test infrastructure, removed custom testrunner. [hannosch]
Use Umlaut ä in tests in order to check string/bytes handling. Refactor test_encoding to unittest. [jensens]
trans-unit.target: Use Umlaut ä in tests in order to check string/bytes handling. Refactor test_encoding to unittest. [jensens]

trans-unit.source: Use binascii.b2a_base64 instead of base64.encodestring; the former doesn’t inject newlines every 76 characters, which makes it easier to strip just the last one (slightly faster). This fixes tickets #7323 and #7325. [mj]
trans-unit.target: Use binascii.b2a_base64 instead of base64.encodestring; the former doesn’t inject newlines every 76 characters, which makes it easier to strip just the last one (slightly faster). This fixes tickets #7323 and #7325. [mj]

trans-unit.source: Use the standard libraries doctest module. [hannosch]
statusmessages provides an easy way of handling internationalized status messages managed via an BrowserRequest adapter storing status messages in client-side cookies.
trans-unit.target: statusmessages обеспечивает простой способ обработки интернационализированных сообщений о состоянии,управляемых с помощью адаптера BrowserRequest,хранящего сообщения о состоянии в клиентских cookie-файлах.
